name: analyze_enzyme_kinetics_assay
description: Performs in vitro enzyme kinetics assay and analyzes the dose-dependent effects of modulators.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: enzyme_name
inputs.description: Name of the purified enzyme being tested

inputs.name: substrate_concentrations
inputs.description: List of substrate concentrations in Î¼M for kinetic analysis

inputs.name: enzyme_concentration
inputs.description: Concentration of the enzyme in nM

inputs.name: modulators
inputs.description: Dictionary of modulators where keys are modulator names and values are lists of concentrations in Î¼M (optional)

inputs.name: time_points
inputs.description: Time points in minutes for time-course measurements (optional, default: [0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 30, 45, 60])

output.description: Research log summarizing the enzyme kinetics assay procedure and results
